snippet: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as an environmental activist fighting for the South Bronx, but her swift rise has also made her a polarizing figure.
abstract: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as environmental activist fighting for South Bronx, but her meteoric rise has also made her polarizing figure; fight over FreshDirect's relocation to South Bronx, grocery delivery service she has contract with, shows divide over her legacy; many former allies and neighbors say Carter is trading on credibility she built in Bronx, while no longer representing its interests.

byline.contributor: Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Majora Carter earned fame and fortune as an environmental activist fighting for the South Bronx, but her swift rise has also made her a polarizing figure.

headline.seo: A Hero of the Bronx, Majora Carter Is Now Accused of Betraying It
headline.main: Hero of the Bronx Is Now Accused of Betraying It
headline.print_headline: Hero of the Bronx Is Now Accused of Betraying It
